attributes.action: Increase caring sector pay as a whole
attributes.additional_details: Professional carers that look after the elderly and the disabled are paid unfairly some have to drive between houses which they aren't paid for they are only paid for the time they spend with the clients and there pay is already pretty low hourly . If we increased their pay they would be even more motivated to do better and to care for them better . We call for reform on how they are paid and for how much they are paid .
